name: CaveGame Atmosphere Test
description:
Hi there! This prototype was an atmosphere test made by Studio Aurora, we made Heckle Dungeon together! We were't able to work on this project much outside of this atmosphere test but we wanted to show off what we made so far! Also, check out the rest of the music here!

Controls: 

WASD & Mouse - Move and Look around
E - Talk to NPC
R - Reset Scene

(Note, you can fall out of bounds! Press R to reset the scene then.)
